participant_1.name: George
participant_1.personality: Optimistic and family-oriented, with a love for nature and a desire to create a big family.
participant_1.background: I am expecting triplets in three months. I recently moved to this country. I already have stepchildren. I work at a school.

participant_2.name: Lucas
participant_2.personality: Confident and adventurous, with a taste for luxury and a passion for agriculture.
participant_2.background: I married a supermodel from Italy. My favorite food is papaya. I've zero family that I'm close to. I'm a bee farmer. My name is George.

content.text: hi, live in a farm is great, i like fesh air and nature
i have a wonderful italien wife
i m just married and have no family, but i wanna make a lot of children
what do u do for living?
